body_html:
Nope. It's just an Ubuntu bug.

  • https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/ca-certificates-java/+bug/1396760
  • https://stackoverflow.com/a/30699960

Run:

sudo /var/lib/dpkg/info/ca-certificates-java.postinst configure

See also:

  • https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=mirror.bazel.build&hideResults=on

body:
Nope. It's just an Ubuntu bug.

- https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/ca-certificates-java/+bug/1396760
- https://stackoverflow.com/a/30699960

Run:

```sh
sudo /var/lib/dpkg/info/ca-certificates-java.postinst configure
```

See also:

- https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=mirror.bazel.build&hideResults=on
